title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite only code redemption offer for OTZ
longDescription:
Welcome to the Online Internal Test.. Preferred play times for load testing are 8pm-10pm EST on Tues/Thurs. We've started a Slack channel "fortnite_internaltest" so everyone can coordinate.
10/15 Update: We've corrected an issue where player classes could be switched mid zone. Not even the Ninja is that sneaky!
